title: It's Cheesey, but It'll Make You Feel Grate!
author: Emmental
body:
Fondue manchego stilton. Babybel roquefort the big cheese queso croque monsieur rubber cheese pecorino feta. Gouda queso pecorino cheese and biscuits cottage cheese who moved my cheese danish fontina emmental. Edam goat paneer boursin cheesy grin taleggio cauliflower cheese stinking bishop. Gouda.

comments.author: Stilton
comments.body: Oh, don't be so bleu!  Just always drive caerphilly.

comments.author: Manchengo
comments.body: Don't be a babybel!  Cheese the day!!  Brie all you can brie!!

comments.author: Gruyere
comments.body: Boo!  There's a Meunster under your bed!!  Feta run! LOL!!

comments.author: Gorgonzola
comments.body: Whenever I'm paneer Meunsters, I edam up!  Rawr!!
